dialogue.text: That guy is so silly! I always see him walking down the sidewalk with a goofy pep in his step.
I can't even believe that guy is a real human being. Everything about him is so... weird... and uncanny.
What makes matters worse is that I can't find jack squat about him online!
There's no way a guy that wealthy has no skeletons in his closet, but where the heck are they?
I never really thought that deeply about him. He doesn't give off a malicious vibe, if you ask me. He just loves music and smiles.
Maybe it's not that deep? I'd like to believe at least one rich guy out there isn't all shady and gross.
Nope. I don't believe that for a second. Showman is definitely hiding something.
Showman... Y'know, it just dawned on me... That's not even a real name! That's just a title!
I mean... it could be his real name. I've heard weirder names than that.
Plus, didn't we see that study recently that said names starting with 'S' are extremely common? Heh, the two of us fit the bill on that.
Don't you think it's missing that distinct... 'flavor' that most names have? It's all not adding up to me.
We're gonna dig deep, viewers. I swear I'll find something on him if I just keep searching...
Syn... let's maybe NOT do this while we're live-
Ooh, it's been a while since I've searched through data this heavily protected.
Syn, please-
WAIT, I THINK I GOT IT!
Had to search some SUPER classified city archives for this, but look! A record of his old Enzync City ID!
It's pretty crusty, but it's gotta have his real name on it! I'm fixing this up right now!
SYN, STOP-!
ENHANCING... ENHANCING... AND THERE IT IS!
SHOWMAN'S REAL NAME IS R-
S-sorry about all that, viewers...
Syn, you can't leak info like that! That'll put us in serious trouble!
Sorry... I got real carried away there.
Please don't do that again! Ok, Syn?
Yeah... my bad... Sorry, Sunny.
I got my question answered at least. Though somehow the answer feels just too ironic to be satisfying...
Let's just drop it and move onto another topic.
